definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)

pinyin: Mei2 gong1 he2 san1 jiao3 zhou1

definition: Greater Mekong Subregion (GMS), area of economic cooperation between China and Vietnam
pinyin: Da4 Mei2 gong1 he2 ci4 qu1 yu4

definition: Greater Mekong Subregion (GMS), economic cooperation program between China and Vietnam
pinyin: Da4 Mei2 gong1 he2 ci4 qu1 yu4 he2 zuo4

sentences.english: Fight the rapids as you kayak and raft down the vast Mekong River.
sentences.chinese: 當你的皮船和木筏衝進湄公河時和急流的艱險戰鬥。

sentences.english: It has a very good sunset-over-the-Mekong view.
sentences.chinese: 這也是一個非常美麗的湄公河上日落景色。

sentences.english: Prof Qin stops short of saying that China should accept full membership of the Mekong Commission.
sentences.chinese: 秦教授並沒有認爲中國應當完全加入湄公河委員會。

sentences.english: Fish in the Mekong, they are both food and also economics, " Trandem said."
sentences.chinese: 湄公河裏的魚既是食物，也涉及經濟範疇。

sentences.english: Recently a Bangkok Post editorial accused China of “Killing the Mekong”.
sentences.chinese: 最近《曼谷郵報》一篇社論譴責中國“謀殺湄公河”。

sentences.english: Vietnamese restaurant with unique flavor of the River Mekong is furnished on the third floor.
sentences.chinese: 賓館三樓爲您設有具有獨特風味的湄公河越南餐廳。

sentences.english: I would not, for example, let her swim in the Mekong.
sentences.chinese: 我不會讓她在比如湄公河這樣的河裏游泳。

sentences.english: Yet the row over the drop in the Mekong seems under control.
sentences.chinese: 然而，關於湄公河流量降低的問題似乎得到控制。

sentences.english: The next morning I joined a two-day cruise up the Mekong.
sentences.chinese: 第二天上午，我參加了爲時兩天的湄公河巡航遊。

sentences.english: The two-day Greater Mekong Subregion summit begins Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 爲期兩天的大湄公河次區域首腦會議將於星期天開幕。

sentences.english: Vientiane, the capital of laos, nestles on the banks of the mekong river .
sentences.chinese: 老撾的首都萬象就座落在湄公河岸上。

sentences.english: On the Mekong alone China has planned or built eight dams.
sentences.chinese: 僅在湄公河上，中國計劃修建或已修建了八座大壩。

sentences.english: The second part: Laos development plan of Mekong river basin.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分，老撾的湄公河流域開發規劃。

sentences.english: A sucker fish is among new species discovered in the Greater Mekong region.
sentences.chinese: 亞口魚是發現於大湄公河地區的新物種之一。

sentences.english: Here is our guide to a two-wheeled adventure in the Mekong region
sentences.chinese: 我們在這裏介紹一些湄公河地區的摩托車探險路線。

sentences.english: Traditional boats cross the Mekong River at dusk.
sentences.chinese: 黃昏時刻，傳統的小船劃過湄公河。

definition: Lancang River of Qinghai and Yunnan, the upper reaches of Mekong River 湄公河[Mei2 gong1 He2] of Southeast Asia
Irrawaddy or Ayeyarwaddy River, the main river of Myanmar (Burma)
Irrawaddy or Ayeyarwaddy River, the main river of Myanmar (Burma)
Chao Phraya River (aka Menam), the main river of Thailand

pinyin: Mei2 gong1 he2 san1 jiao3 zhou1

definition: Nujiang river of south Tibet and northwest Yunnan, the upper reaches of Salween river 薩爾溫江|萨尔温江, forming border of Myanmar and Thailand
Salween river, flowing from Tibet into Myanmar
Honghe county in Honghe Hani and Yi autonomous prefecture, Yunnan/Red River in China/Northern Vietnam
